That's what the Rise Credit will do. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1119300514334806018/img/a1-z2i-MddXs5e7p.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1119300514334806018/vid/320x320/D9eIsu0RGtEP3lX6.mp4?tag=11
